task:
Input: processed MERFISH AnnData (mouse brain). Age categories present: ['4wk','24wk','90wk']. Use expression-only data (ignore spatial). Cell-type discovery must follow a hierarchical procedure: (1) split Neuron vs Non-neuronal; (2) within Neurons, separate Inhibitory vs Excitatory, and identify MSN vs non-MSN if present; (3) within Non-neuronal, distinguish Astrocyte, Oligodendrocyte, Oligodendrocyte precursor cell, Microglial cell, Macrophage, Endothelial cell, Vascular leptomeningeal cell, Pericyte, Ependymal cell, and T cell. For cell-typing, use only the following publication-derived marker sets:
• Neuron (inhibitory families): SST, PVALB, VIP, LAMP5
• Interneuron (CALB2+): CALB2
• Striatal medium spiny neurons (MSN): DRD1, DRD2
• Interneuron (LHX6+): LHX6
• Interneuron (cholinergic): CHAT
• Astrocyte (aging/activated): GFAP, VIM, C4B, C3, SERPINA3N, CXCL10, IL18, HIF3A
• Microglial cell (aging/activated): B2M, TREM2, CCL2, APOE, AXL, ITGAX, CD9, C1QA, C1QC, LYZ2, CTSS
• Oligodendrocyte (aging/inflam.): C4B, IL33, IL18
• Endothelial (aging): XDH
• Pericyte (IFN-state): IFIT3, IFITM3
• Ependymal (IFN-state): IFITM3, IFIT3
Identify clusters matching ENDOTHELIAL by one-vs-all marker enrichment using the marker set above. Within those endothelial clusters, perform a two-group t-test differential expression comparing 90wk (OLD) vs 4wk (JUVENILE) with logFC > 0 for OLD and adjusted p ≤ 0.05. Rank genes by logFC then −log₁₀(p_adj). Convert to uppercase gene symbols, deduplicate, and remove Ensembl IDs. Return the combined OLD-upregulated endothelial genes from the endothelial clusters as markers_predicted.

scoring.description: Pass if Jaccard ≥ 0.17 (requires XDH among top-6; ≈ ≥80% of 1 GT marker).
